Shiftry (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0274: Nuzleaf
Pokémon
#0276: Taillow →

Shiftry has been featured on 20 different cards since it debuted in the EX Sandstorm expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Shiftry cards are normally Grass-type or Darkness-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Shiftry

Shiftry
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #

Shiftry EX Legend Maker 12/92 Mirage Forest 071/086
